items.sentence: Tom isn\'t very different from anybody else.
Let\'s not do anything that might upset Tom.
Let\'s proceed with the items on the agenda.
Let\'s sit around the stove and have a chat.
Tom is the only one who can\'t come with us.
Tom is the only one who doesn\'t look tired.
Tom suggested another plan to the committee.
Tom takes a bath every evening after dinner.
Tom talked me into going to church with him.
Tom talked too much and let the secret slip.
There are many different ways of doing this.
There are many modern buildings around here.
There are millions of stars in the universe.
There is a strange-looking mark on the wall.
Tom and I have been friends for a long time.
Tom and I looked at each other in amazement.
Tom and I often go out for pizza after work.
Tom and I probably should go there together.
Tom and I studied French together yesterday.
Tom didn\'t really want to go out with Mary.
